ygData.subject: RE: Pearls (was Star Rubies)
ygData.msgSnippet: They are a common gem so I don t think it will be worth it to sell to enchanters. I would see how much they are in the store and see if the difference between
ygData.messageBody:
They are a common gem so I don't think it will be
worth it to sell to enchanters. I would see how much
they are in the store and see if the difference
between the two may be worth your time.

I don't think that combination is very popular, except
for maybe skill increases.

Belgarth

--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Worth more than a plat to Enchanters, or should I
> just sell to the vendors?
> If I can't get atleast a 3x return on my money, I
> just sell to vendors. Not
> worth my tmie traveling around looking for people to
> buy stuff unless it's
> worth alot.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Doug Sorensen
> [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 2:36 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Pearls (was Star Rubies)
>
>
> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> You can make jewelry with Pearl. Items are Poison
> Resist and have an Armor Class as well.
>
> Belgarth
>
> --- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> > From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> >
> > Speaking of gems, what is a pearl for? Got one off
> a
> > Griffewe, and a vendor
> > offers a bit over a plat for it. Just wondernig if
> > it was good for something
> > else.
>
>
>
